msItem.title: Iqbal-namah-i Jahangiri: Volume III, covering the reign of Jahangir (A.H. 1014 to 1037).
msItem.note: Lacks one folio at beginning and about three of text at end. (So Morley) It is unclear why Morley states the the MS is dated 1145.
msItem.incipit: ... mukarramish afsurdagiha(-yi) jahan-i bi-ab u rang-ra

bindingDesc.p: Inside front cover, a note stating the binding was repaired in 1971. The leather of the old red covers, which have stamped and painted decoration, has been attached to the covers of the new binding, of red leather with tooled spine.

origin.p: 15 Rabi' II regnal year 19 of Muhammad Shah, under the Subahdari of the vizier Nizam al-Mulk and the deputyship of Hamid Khan Diwana. So colophon.

acquisition.p: Bequest from Major David Price received 5 March 1836.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of India, Mughal period, Jahangir.
